input.sentences: the family went on vacation to location .
our hosts welcomed us with open arms !
our shack was very cosy and rustic .
that morning we went on a guided tour of the water front .
later that afternoon we went on a raft ride . it was a great way to end the day .
output.sentences: We knew we were on vacation when we saw the palm trees.
It was nice seeing the wild animals along the way.
We found the cabin that we are staying at.
We had time for a guided tour.
After the tour we went on a short canoe trip.
